segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation:
BGM, A segment for unique identification of the Extended Payment Order, the type of Extended Payment Order and its function. The requirement for a response, e.g., related debit advice, may be indicated.
Note: The identification will be passed back to the Ordering Customer for reconciliation purposes; it would be used in the case of a cancellation or confirmation of an Extended Payment Order.

segment.name: Business function
segment.documentation: BUS, A segment identifying certain characteristics of the Extended Payment Order, such as its business function. In so doing, it provides information about the message that may be used to route the message within an institution, for tariffing, or for the provision of some statistical information.

segment.name: Payment instructions
segment.documentation: PAI, A segment specifying the conditions, guarantee, method and channel of payment for the Extended Payment Order.

segment.name: Financial charges allocation
segment.documentation: FCA, A segment specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances (e.g., charges borne by the Ordering Customer, the Beneficiary or both), and identifying the Ordering Customers's account to which such charges or allowances should be directed where it is different from the principal account.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, when required, the time at which the message has been created as well as other dates and times relevant to the financial transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying a previously-sent message.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a previously-sent message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date/time of the previously-sent message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the monetary amount and, if necessary, the currencies, exchange rate and date for that payment.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the amount value of the payment.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the reference currency and the target currency of the transaction when they are different. The rate of exchange is solely used when previously agreed between the Ordering Customer and the Ordered Bank.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying other transactions to which funds associated with the Extended Payment Order are related, such as a separate foreign exchange deal.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments providing information about the financial institutions and accounts related to the Extended Payment Order, together with details of any parties to be contacted in relation to the transaction.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution (e.g., bank) and relevant account number and currency for each party involved in the transaction. The Ordering Customer may indicate the previously agreed choice of financial institution for payment.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the financial institution specified in the FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment providing a communication number for the party identified in the FII segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the name and address of the non- financial institutions involved in the transaction and their contacts.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the name and address of the non-financial institutions associated with the Extended Payment Order and their functions.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment providing a communication number for the party identified in the NAD segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments containing instructions from the Ordering Customer relating to parties identified in the NAD and FII segments. It specifies action to be taken by the identified parties, and the date (and optionally time) by which such action needs to be taken.

segment.name: Parties and instruction
segment.documentation: INP, A segment identifying the party originating the instruction and the parties to be contacted at or by the associated financial institution on matters concerning the execution of the payment. It specifies where appropriate the instruction in coded form.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text instruction relating to the associated INP segment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the earliest and the latest dates and times by which the instruction specified in the INP and FTX segments needs to be carried out.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments providing information for subsequent use by regulatory authorities requiring statistical and other types of data. It also identifies the regulatory authority for which the information is intended followed by the information itself.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying what processing should be completed for regulatory authorities.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the amount and the currency of each transaction to be reported.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment giving the different origins/destinations (places) of goods/investment/services.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the recipient of the associated informative text.

segment.name: Requirements and conditions
segment.documentation: RCS, A segment giving the nature (e.g. goods, transport services) and direction of each transaction to be recorded in coded form.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment giving information, in coded or clear form, to provide information relevant to regulatory authorities requirements.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments giving information in free or in coded form about the purpose of the payment from the ordering customer to the beneficiary.

segment.name: Process identification
segment.documentation: PRC, A segment identifying the kind of process at the beneficiary's side.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment in clear form to provide information from the ordering customer to the beneficiary.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments providing details of all documents, e.g., invoices, statements, despatch advices, etc..., to which the Extended Payment Order refers. It includes information on the monetary amounts for each document and on any adjustments (with an indication of the reason for adjustments) and discounts. For information purposes an indication of the tax element can be provided.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying the reference document against which payment is being made.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts of each reference document (e.g., original amount, discount amount etc...). The amount due and the amount remitted are mandatory.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date of the referenced document and indicating any other relevant dates applicable.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment for the inclusion of any additional references related to the reference document.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party name and address, either by coded identification or in a clear form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments specifying the currencies and the related dates/periods valid to the referenced document where different to the reference currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currency and associated exchange rate of the referenced document where different to the remittance currency.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time/period related to the rate of exchange.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments indicating adjustment amounts and their referenced documents.

segment.name: Adjustment details
segment.documentation: AJT, A segment indicating any adjustments to the amounts originally specified in the referenced document, and to which items such adjustments apply, with the associated reason for adjustment.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts of the adjustments of each reference document (e.g. original amounts, discount amount, etc.). The currency data elements should not be used.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment for the inclusion of any additional references related to the reference document.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text information related to the payment details.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments which may be used when required to provide details of individual line items in the reference document.

segment.name: Document line identification
segment.documentation: DLI, A segment identifying a specific line item within the referenced document.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts for this line item.

segment.name: Additional product id
segment.documentation: PIA, A segment specifying item identification codes where required.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time/period related to the line item.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments identifying the currency and the related dates/periods of the line item where different to the remittance and document currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currency and associated exchange rate of the line item, where different to the reference and target currency.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments indicating adjustment amounts and their referenced documents for this line item.

segment.name: Adjustment details
segment.documentation: AJT, A segment indicating any adjustments to the amounts originally specified for this line item and the reason for the adjustments.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts of the adjustment for this line item.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment for the inclusion of any additional references related to the reference document.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text information related to the payment details.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments indicating the end of the details of payment and specifying hash total amounts for control purposes.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment specifying the end of the detail of payment.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment indicating total amounts for control purposes.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments specifying the details of authentication.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment specifying the details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the Extended Payment Order message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date and, where necessary, the time of validation.
